00019   void ExperimentalSetup::print(std::ostream &os) 
00020   {
00021     os << "type=" << getBeamTypeName()
00022        << " energy=" << getPeakEnergy()
00023        << " beam: angle ZX=" << getBeamAngleZX()
00024        << " ZY=" << getBeamAngleZY()
00025        << " position x=" << getBeamImpactPositionX0()
00026        << " position y=" << getBeamImpactPositionY0()
00027        << " detector angle" << getDetectorAngleZX()
00028        << " rot. orig. x=" << getDetectorRotationX0()
00029        << " z=" << getDetectorRotationZ0()
00030        << " pos x=" << getDetectorX0()
00031        << " y=" << getDetectorY0()
00032        << " z=" << getDetectorZ0();
00033   }
